'''''Many-as-One''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to interrupt the [[Hydro Tulpa]] twice in one battle before it can absorb any [[Half-Tulpa]]s, then defeat the Hydro Tulpa.
